name: Maliban Milky Sorties
description: Indulge in the timeless delight of Maliban milk Shortcake Biscuits, a classic treat that embodies the heartwarming flavors of comfort and nostalgia. Crafted by the esteemed Maliban brand, these biscuits are a testament to Sri Lanka`s rich baking tradition and the enduring love for simple, yet incredibly satisfying snacks. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
